basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=2.2-3.3 µM), Leucothrix mucor (MIC>35.0 µM), Serratia marcescens (MIC>35.0 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>35.0 µM), Aeromonas salmonicida (MIC=17.7-35.0 µM), Cytophaga aquatilis (MIC=2.2-4.4 µM), Pasteurella haemolytica (MIC=4.4-8.8 µM), Salmonella typhimurium I (MIC=8.8-17.7 µM), Salmonella typhimurium II (MIC=8.8-17.7 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=1.1-2.2 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=17.7-35.0 µM).
